subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description:
EXPECTED OUTPUTS :
1. Knowledge base on poverty environment linkages improved and disseminated 
2. Develop practical mechanisms and tools to integrate environmental issues into PRSP II and sectoral policies
3. Capacity to mainstream environment into poverty reduction strategies built 
4. Strengthened and coordinated  stakeholder participation in poverty-environment initiatives 
5. Approved PEI programme for Rwanda to build capacity, mechanisms, and institutions to mainstream environment into development and sectoral plans
donor_long: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
subproject.title: Poverty and Environment Progra
